title: Hmangaihna in nuam kan tan a buatsaih chu
lyrics:
Hmangaihna in nuam kan tan a buatsaih chu,
Mawi leh eng ropuiin a zam vel;
Chu anga in nuam a awm ngai lo,
Lui ral ram kan thlen hunin kan chang ang.

Hmangaihna ram i pan ang u.
Thihna lui ral ram mawiah chuan,
Chu anga in nuam a awm ngai lo,
Lui ral ram kan thlen hunin kan chang ang.

Chutah chuan nunna thing par a chuai ngai lo,
Tlan sate an zalenna ramah;
Inthenna a awm ngai tawh lo va,
Chatuanin lenrual kimin kan cheng ang.

Hun leh kum leh nite an lo ral zel a,
Khawvel par mawite pawh an chuai thei;
Kan tan khawvel ni a kin hunah,
Hmangaihna ram mawiah chuan kan cheng ang.

Hmangaihna dar ri mawi chu a thang vel e,
Ngaithlain Lalpa hnen rawn pan r'u;
Riltam, tuihal a awm tawh lo vang,
Pa Pathia
n ni aia eng, chatuanin.
